title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 50-3.5 - Decisions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 50-3.5 - Decisions

State Regulations
A copy of the decision shall be provided to the provider and qualified person. The record of a meeting will include notices, written statements, any other information submitted and a copy of the decision. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
50-3.5

Renumbered from 50-3.8 and 50-3.9

New

York State Register September 30, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 39, eff. 9/30/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
